standard.name: Logging:IncludeScopes
standard.description: Indicates whether log scopes are enabled.

standard.name: Logging:Debug:LogLevel:Default
standard.description: The default log level for the Debug provider.

standard.name: Logging:Console:LogLevel:Default
standard.description: The default log level for the Console provider.

standard.name: Logging:ApplicationInsights:LogLevel:Default
standard.description: The default log level for the Application Insights provider.

standard.name: AzureInsightsTelemetryOptions:Enabled
standard.description: Indicates whether telemetry on Azure Application Insights is enabled.

standard.name: AzureInsightsTelemetryOptions:IgnoreErrors
standard.description: Indicates whether errors while recording telemetry should be ignored.

standard.name: AzureInsightsTelemetryOptions:DeveloperMode
standard.description: Indicates whether the developer mode is enabled. When enabled, telemetry records are dispatched faster.

standard.name: AzureInsightsTelemetryOptions:EnableAdaptiveSampling
standard.description: Indicates whether adaptive sampling is enabled.

standard.name: AzureInsightsTelemetryOptions:DefaultProperties:Lithium-Service
standard.description: The default property that identifies the Lithium service.

standard.name: AzureInsightsTelemetryOptions:InstrumentationKey
standard.description: The Azure Application Insights instrumentation key.

standard.name: AzureInsightsTelemetryOptions:RequestTracking:TrackRequestHeaders
standard.description: Indicates whether request headers should be tracked.

standard.name: AzureInsightsTelemetryOptions:RequestTracking:TrackResponseHeaders
standard.description: Indicates whether response headers should be tracked.

standard.name: AzureInsightsTelemetryOptions:RequestTracking:IgnoreAvailabilityTestsRequests
standard.description: Indicates whether requests to availability endpoints should be ignored in telemetry.

standard.name: AzureKeyVaultSecretsStorageOptions:AutomaticAuthenticationEnabled
standard.description: Indicates whether automatic authentication with Azure KeyVault is enabled.

standard.name: AzureKeyVaultSecretsStorageOptions:ClientId
standard.description: The client identifier that should be used to authenticate with Azure KeyVault (when automatic authentication is disabled or not configured.

standard.name: AzureKeyVaultSecretsStorageOptions:ClientSecret
standard.description: The client secret that should be used to authenticate with Azure KeyVault (when automatic authentication is disabled or not configured.

standard.name: AzureKeyVaultSecretsStorageOptions:ConfigurationStorageBaseUrl
standard.description: The base address of the Azure KeyVault that should be used for configuration.

standard.name: AzureTableStorageOptions:ConnectionString
standard.description: The connection string used by the Table Storage service.
